content: is there such a thing as  RC book outline (others on Kindle?)?

Yes, there are various resources available for outlining books on Kindle, including books specifically focused on outlining and structuring romance novels. These resources can provide guidance on creating a compelling story arc, developing memorable characters, and constructing effective plotlines. Some popular titles include "Romancing the Beat: Story Structure for Romance Novels" by Gwen Hayes and "Outlining Your Novel: Map Your Way to Success" by K.M. Weiland. These books can be found and purchased on Kindle as well.
